availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John E. Simms (Bracken County, Kentucky, farm laborer)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary J. Simms. Father of Jacob F. Simms, Malinda J. Mattingly, James R. Simms, William H. Simms, Matilda E. Simms. Farm laborer in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population/Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Eastern District, p. 119.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates, Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA Roll # 7020621, Campbell County, September 20, 1940.
